name: Alex & The Furball Monsters
description:
Really just a classic point & click adventure for the Adventure Game Challenge. Created by an ambitious spare-time artist and a regular programmer who never really created this type of game before. As is tradition we mercilessly ran out of time. But, we learned a lot & had a great time. Cheers!

General Controls:
Left Mouse Button click to pick, talk or use. Left Mouse Button drag to manipulate inventory items.

Special Controls:
[M] Toggle Music
[Alt+F4] Quit
